definitions.definition: to throw something so that it goes high in the air in a curve:
examples: Police started lobbing (= throwing) tear gas canisters into the crowd.

definitions.definition: (in some sports) to hit, kick, or throw the ball high in the air so that it goes over the head of your opponent :
examples: The goalkeeper had come out of the goal and Webster lobbed the ball over his head into the empty net.

definitions.definition: a high, curving hit of a ball:
examples: Jones hit a beautiful lob over his opponent's head.
